Well Services | revenue = $2.3 billion USD (2004) | products = Oil field
services and rentals | homepage = [http://www.precisiondrilling.com/
www.precisiondrilling.com] }} 'Precision Drilling Corporation' (, ) is the
largest drilling rig contractor in Canada, also providing oil field rental and
supplies. Operations expanded from 3 drilling rigs in 1984 to over 240+ drilling
rigs and worldwide operations (Mexico, North Africa, Middle East, Kazakhstan,
India, etc.)
